verbs.description: The shell company Mr. Cohen [V: used] to pay Stormy Daniels later received over $ 1 million from the firm and several companies with business before the Trump administration .
The shell company [ARG0: Mr. Cohen] used to [V: pay] [ARG2: Stormy Daniels] later received over $ 1 million from the firm and several companies with business before the Trump administration .
